subject: PING ME! Boost Marketing and Customer Engagement in 2024
preview: Digital Impact and Innovation with the Chat Commerce Platform     2024 is off to a fantastic start! We've been busy at Clickatell, delivering innovative Chat Commerce solutions for leading consumer br

full_threads.body:
Digital Impact and Innovation with the Chat Commerce Platform


2024 is off to a fantastic start! We've been busy at Clickatell, delivering innovative Chat Commerce solutions for leading consumer brands. We've welcomed new partners, deployed exciting projects, and made updates to our Chat Commerce Platform to empower forward-thinking brands like yours to stay ahead of the digital curve.

Let's Chat

Turn WhatsApp into an Engaging Marketing Tool

WhatsApp is not only a useful communication and customer support tool but also a powerful, high-reach marketing and sales channel. Bring customer engagement to life with powerful features that give your customers no choice but to interact with you! Combine these features into user journeys that deliver rich engagement with your brand and convenient end-to-end digital commerce experiences through chat:

Ads That Click
to Whatsapp.

Templates.

Campaign
Messaging.

Messages

Conversational
Components

Catalog

Read More

Of Meta customers on the WhatsApp Business Platform:

94%

saw improved
conversion rates*

89%

reported a higher average
order value with WhatsApp*

*Forrester Consulting
Contact Sales
Try It Out

Retail - Spar 🛍️


SPAR Eastern Cape now distribute their specials leaflets to customers using WhatsApp to address the challenges associated with costly and less effective traditional print methods, while providing a measurable, targeted, and more engaging way to reach customers.

Airlines - FlySafair ✈️


FlySafair, South Africa's largest domestic airline, partnered with Clickatell to enable digital checkins, notifications of flight status, purchase of extra baggage, and live agent support without customers needing to download an app, only using WhatsApp.

Celebrate April's Global Festivities!
April brings a burst of vibrant festivals from every corner of the globe!

🌸🏯

Delicate blossoms paint the town pink at the Cherry Blossom Festival in Japan.

🔫💦

The streets come alive
with water fights at the
Songkran Festival in
Thailand.

🌅🎧

Coachella, the iconic
music and fashion
festival, kicks off in the
Californian desert.

A Marathon in the Mother City

In South Africa, endurance is the order of the day with the 🏃 Two Oceans Marathon. This year, 14,000 runners from all over the globe will take part in this race around the Cape Peninsula, often voted the most breath-taking race in the world.

Let's Unlock the Power of Chat Commerce


Clickatell's Chat Commerce Platform empowers forward-thinking brands to deliver
exceptional customer experiences. Contact us today to discuss your vision and let's build the future of customer engagement together!


Chat soon,
Team Clickatell

Try our interactive retail chatbot demo in WhatsApp! Scan the QR code and explore features like buttons, lists, and a seamless checkout experience in a real-world digital commerce scenario.

Try it out! Add a product to your cart and make a purchase in WhatsApp.
